title-group.article-title: THE MINIMAL CONFORMING H k FINITE ELEMENT SPACES ON R n RECTANGULAR GRIDS

abstract.p: A family of Ck−1-Qk finite elements on Rn rectangular grids is constructed. The finite element space is shown to be the full Ck−1-Qk space and possess the optimal order of approximation property. The polynomial degree is minimal in order to form such a Hk finite element space. Numerical tests are provided for using the 2D C¹-Q₂ and C²-Q₃ finite elements.
